CDIO.pathFinder
Class AreaMap

java.lang.Object
  CDIO.pathFinder.AreaMap

public class AreaMap
extends java.lang.Object

The AreaMap holds information about the With, Height, Start position, Goal position and Obstacles on the map. A place on the map is referred to by it's (x,y) coordinates, where (0,0) is the upper left corner, and x is horizontal and y is vertical.

AreaMap

public AreaMap(int mapWith,

Class constructor specifying the With and Height of a otherwise empty map. (no start and goal location or obstacles)

Parameters:
mapWith -
mapHeight -

AreaMap

public AreaMap(int mapWith,
               int mapHeight,
               int[][] obstacleMap)
Class constructor specifying the With, Height and Obstacles of the map. (no start and goal location) The Obstacle 2D array map can be any With and Height

Parameters:
mapWith - the with of the map as int
mapHeight - the Height of the map as int
obstacleMap - a 2D int array map of the obstacles on the map. '1' is obstacle, '0' is not.

getDistanceBetween

public float getDistanceBetween(Node node1,
                                Node node2)
Determine the distance between two neighbor Nodes as used by the AStar algorithm.

Parameters:
node1 - any Node
node2 - any of Node1's neighbors
Returns:
Float - the distance between the two neighbors

clear

public void clear()
Removes all the map information about start location, goal location and obstacles. Then remakes the map with the original With and Height.
